mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operate (allocateid, oper_date, oper_count, accu_passenger) VALUES (#{allocateid}, to_date(#{today},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, b.bus_num, div(o.accu_passenger,o.oper_count) average FROM operate o JOIN allocate a ON o.allocateid = a.allocateid JOIN bus b ON a.busid = b.busid WHERE o.oper_count > 0 ORDER BY o.oper_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE operate SET oper_count = #{oper_count}, accu_passenger = #{accu_passenger} WHERE operateid = #{operateid}
mapper.select: SELECT max(operateid) operateid FROM operate WHERE allocateid = #{allocateid}
